categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: FatLump was a member of the technology-hating Meatlump gang at the time of the Galactic Civil War. Following the Battle of Yavin, this graffiti artist created many of the graffiti used by the Meatlumps to mark their territory.

FatLump was mentioned in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. FatLump was mentioned during the "Meatlumps Theme Park", added to the game with "Chapter 10: The Search for the Meatlump King", released on June 19, 2008.

Players could purchase various Meatlump items from a vendor in the Meatlump Hideout, including a number of graffiti that could be used to decorate the players' virtual homes. The description text of all of these graffiti mentioned that they were made by FatLump.
